lead_paragraph: The National Football League suspended Minnesota Vikings left tackle Bryant McKinnie on Friday for four games without pay for violating the league’s personal conduct policy. He is eligible to return Sept. 29. McKinnie has pleaded not guilty to charges stemming from a street brawl outside a Miami nightclub in February.
